Package edu.jsu.mcis

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argument
    As an extension of the CommandLineArgument class, Argument focuses on everything dealing with positional arguments.
    ArgumentParser
    ArgumentParser is the main class in the library.
    CommandLineArgument
    The CommandLineArgument class represents the abstraction of a general argument that can be parsed from the command-line.
    OptionalArgument
    As an extension of the Command Line Argument class, this class focuses entirely on the information and attributes associated with optional (named) arguments and assigning them to the proper element in the optional argument.
    XMLParser
    XMLParser is an implementation of Argument Parser dedicated for XML.

    Enum Description
